game.name: Lofi Neko Girl: Idle Companion
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A soothing lofi idle companion for your desktop. Watch the girl work, wind down, and fall asleep as her energy resets. Upgrade her stamina, improve her focus, and decorate her cozy lofi window scene while you work or unwind.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A soothing lofi idle companion for your desktop. Watch the girl work, wind down, and fall asleep as her energy resets. Upgrade her stamina, improve her focus, and decorate her cozy lofi window scene while you work or unwind.
